main event: A yellow and red flaming elongated object was observed in Charleston, South Carolina on December 31, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared high in the sky and moved slowly,The sighting lasted for about 20-25 minutes,The object seemed to resemble an exhaust trail,There was no sound associated with the object,After the object faded, a star appeared in the same vicinity.
sighted object: yellow and red flaming elongated object
